text:
Greetings:

Here is the link at cert.org that describes a bug for tomcat.  

http://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/208131

Looked at recent release notes regarding this issue and did not find anything. 
Has this been addressed yet?
creator: wbrown338@netscape.net

text:
I don't see this behavior with Tomcat.  Please provide a test case, or ask on 
tomcat-user@jakarta.apache.org if you require more assistance.
creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
